member.name: M:NVorbis.VorbisReader.ReadSamples(System.Single[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Reads decoded samples from the current logical stream
member.param: The buffer to write the samples to
The offset into the buffer to write the samples to
The number of samples to write

member.name: M:NVorbis.VorbisReader.SwitchStreams(System.Int32)
member.summary: Switches to an alternate logical stream.
member.param: The logical stream index to switch to
member.returns: True if the properties of the logical stream differ from those of the one previously being decoded. Otherwise, False.

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.Channels
member.summary: Gets the number of channels in the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.SampleRate
member.summary: Gets the sample rate of the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.UpperBitrate
member.summary: Gets the encoder's upper bitrate of the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.NominalBitrate
member.summary: Gets the encoder's nominal bitrate of the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.LowerBitrate
member.summary: Gets the encoder's lower bitrate of the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.Vendor
member.summary: Gets the encoder's vendor string for the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.Comments
member.summary: Gets the comments in the current selected Vorbis stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.ContainerOverheadBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read that are related to framing and transport alone

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.Stats
member.summary: Gets stats from each decoder stream available

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.StreamIndex
member.summary: Gets the currently-selected stream's index

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.StreamCount
member.summary: Returns the number of logical streams found so far in the physical container

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.DecodedTime
member.summary: Gets or Sets the current timestamp of the decoder. Is the timestamp before the next sample to be decoded

member.name: P:NVorbis.VorbisReader.TotalTime
member.summary: Gets the total length of the current logical stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.EffectiveBitRate
member.summary: Gets the calculated bit rate of audio stream data for the everything decoded so far

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.InstantBitRate
member.summary: Gets the calculated bit rate for the last ~1 second of audio

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.PageLatency
member.summary: Gets the calculated latency per page

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.PacketLatency
member.summary: Gets the calculated latency per packet

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.SecondLatency
member.summary: Gets the calculated latency per second of output

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.OverheadBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read that do not contribute to the output audio

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.AudioBits
member.summary: Gets the number of bits read that contribute to the output audio

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.PagesRead
member.summary: Gets the number of pages read so far in the current stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.TotalPages
member.summary: Gets the total number of pages in the current stream

member.name: P:NVorbis.IVorbisStreamStatus.Clipped
member.summary: Gets whether the stream has been clipped since the last reset

member.name: M:NVorbis.Ogg.ContainerReader.GatherNextPage(System.Int32,NVorbis.Ogg.ContainerReader.PageReaderLock)
member.summary: Gathers pages until finding a page for the stream indicated
